meanings.definition: The act of creating a defined shape or outline of something.
meanings.sent1: She used contouring to give the painting a clear shape.
meanings.sent2: Her contouring of the landscape brought out its features beautifully.
meanings.sent3: The contouring of the cake with frosting made it look like a mountain.
meanings.sent4: His contouring of the story revealed its hidden depths.
meanings.sent5: The contouring of the map made it easier to understand the geography.

meanings.definition: The process of emphasizing or enhancing the natural structure of the face through makeup techniques.
meanings.sent1: Contouring with makeup can highlight cheekbones.
meanings.sent2: She learned contouring to enhance her facial features.
meanings.sent3: His exaggerated contouring made him look like a clown.
meanings.sent4: Her contouring was so skillful, it transformed her appearance.
meanings.sent5: The contouring technique accentuated her natural beauty.
